snippet.title: Rogue Heroes: Ruins of Tasos - Launch Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Rogue Heroes: Ruins of Tasos is out now on Nintendo Switch! https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/rogue-heroes-ruins-of-tasos-switch/

Rogue Heroes is a classic adventure game with a modern, rogue-lite twist! Play solo or form a party of up to 4 players with online or local co-op and take on procedural dungeons, explore an expansive overworld full of secrets and take down the Titans to save the once peaceful land of Tasos!

Follow Heliocentric Studios on Twitter: https://twitter.com/heliocstudios
Follow Rogue Heroes on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RogueHeroesRoT/

Follow Team17 on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Team17Ltd
Like Team17 on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Team17/

#RogueHeroes #NintendoSwitch

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/

Like Nintendo on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Nintendo
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
Follow us on Instagram: http://instagram.com/Nintendo
Follow us on Pinterest: http://pinterest.com/Nintendo
